lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour expanded its Asia swing to three tournaments Monday by adding a new event in South Korea with a limited field and a $9.25 million purse.

headline.print_headline: PGA Tour to Play Official Event in South Korea Next Year
headline.main: PGA Tour to Play Official Event in South Korea Next Year

snippet: The PGA Tour expanded its Asia swing to three tournaments Monday by adding a new event in South Korea with a limited field and a $9.25 million purse....
